text: 7.10 2 Sml 12.13, Snd 17.22, Mat 26.75, 27.3-5, Hib 12.16-17 Nɨgɨm. God binɨb kɨlop gek chɨb gup won ak, kɨlop chɨb gek tap si tap tɨmel gɨpun ak taynen anɨgɨpun agɨl kelɨgɨpal. Kelɨgel, God kɨlop tɨg asɨk dup. Pen taynen chɨnop chɨb gek tap si tap tɨmel kelɨgɨpun agɨl gos ma nepal. Binɨb lum awl yɨl ak pen, kɨli tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal won ak, kɨlop chɨb gek kumnɨgel tek lup.
